summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6018 for the improvement of East Prospect Street from 38th Avenue North to 39th Avenue North; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81219, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
